title: Exam Score Required
question_text:
Every summer, Mr. Jones teaches a Pre-Calculus boot camp for freshmen who wish to take Calculus as sophomores. However, only students who score in the top $30 \%$ of the final exam will advance to Calculus the following year.
If the distribution of final exam scores is approximately normal with a mean of $73 \%$ and a standard deviation of $4.3$, what final exam score is needed to ensure a student advances?
